other_tests.findings: Presence of shadowing stones measuring up to 2.4 cm lodged in the neck of the gallbladder, mild intrahepatic biliary dilation, and mild pericholecystic fluid.
Hepatic parenchyma within normal limits, smooth liver contour, no focal liver mass, patent main portal vein, no ascites, distended gallbladder without wall thickening, and normal pancreas.
